about_the_game:
Somewhere in France, in an ordinary suburb near Paris, in an ordinary apartment, with ordinary people in an ordinary situation. Johnny and Marianne watch
their very popular reality TV show "Les Parisiens sont dans le pré".



Johnny is away and you receive a mysterious message from a certain F. Voltaire




Savages do not think of killing themselves out of disgust for life; it is a refinement of intellectual people. We await you in the corridors of supreme knowledge.
F. Voltaire.



It's too much, he's going to take a lot of it!

About the game


You face your opponents with your bare hands and your martial arts skills will be essential to you. Advance in your investigation and through your encounters to discover where Johnny is hiding.

The story takes place in our time, French culture is present. Reference to writers and works which serve as mental torture in French schools. But also discover French habits, with the national sport of strikes and blockades, just to say “NO, I don’t want to!”. Public transport is at its best when it works. You will navigate luxurious neighborhoods with 4-star trash cans, filthy hyper-hyped streets, with nice people who are drugged, alcoholic or simply stupid.

As the Great General de Gaulle said: “France cannot be France without greatness.”

Through all the commotion, distribution of slaps, with exploded skulls, will you manage to find Johnny, kidnap him. It's Voltaire's fault again, REVOLUTION!

content_descriptors.notes:
* Suggested and visible alcohol and drug consumption (in pill/capsule form).
* Rude dialogue/insulting.
* Certain situations that are, for the most part, absurd will sometimes have scenes of gratuitous violence.

detailed_description:
Somewhere in France, in an ordinary suburb near Paris, in an ordinary apartment, with ordinary people in an ordinary situation. Johnny and Marianne watch
their very popular reality TV show "Les Parisiens sont dans le pré".



Johnny is away and you receive a mysterious message from a certain F. Voltaire




Savages do not think of killing themselves out of disgust for life; it is a refinement of intellectual people. We await you in the corridors of supreme knowledge.
F. Voltaire.



It's too much, he's going to take a lot of it!

About the game


You face your opponents with your bare hands and your martial arts skills will be essential to you. Advance in your investigation and through your encounters to discover where Johnny is hiding.

The story takes place in our time, French culture is present. Reference to writers and works which serve as mental torture in French schools. But also discover French habits, with the national sport of strikes and blockades, just to say “NO, I don’t want to!”. Public transport is at its best when it works. You will navigate luxurious neighborhoods with 4-star trash cans, filthy hyper-hyped streets, with nice people who are drugged, alcoholic or simply stupid.

As the Great General de Gaulle said: “France cannot be France without greatness.”

Through all the commotion, distribution of slaps, with exploded skulls, will you manage to find Johnny, kidnap him. It's Voltaire's fault again, REVOLUTION!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Latest Ubuntu LTS or Latest Steam OS
  • Processor: Dual-Core Processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 900 series or Radeon HD
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Latest Ubuntu LTS or Latest Steam OS
  • Processor: Quad-Core Procesor and more
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2050 series or Radeon RX
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Where is Johnny

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual-Core Processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 900 series or Radeon HD
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Quad-Core Procesor and more
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2050 series or Radeon RX
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

dejus.descriptors:
Violência Extrema
Drogas ilícitas
Linguagem imprópria

short_description: Johnny still hasn't come home. But where is he ? Who is this Voltaire? Fight to discover the truth.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian
